DOC.detailed_description: The long-term objective research project enhance program participation improve vocational outcome people work disability due arthritis related musculoskeletal disorder ( ARMD ) actively seek vocational rehabilitation service . Some researcher think people work disability due ARMD seek vocational rehabilitation ( VR ) service expose `` agency access intervention '' likely gain entrance VR system determine eligible service similar people expose intervention . Further , think people work disability due ARMD determine eligible VR service , expose `` agency enhancement intervention '' receiving service , likely become remain employed upon completion VR program similar people expose intervention . The research design randomize , control , field experiment compare vocational outcome group receive two-part intervention receive intervention . The design allow u evaluate separately component intervention . The intervention consist train session help prospective VR client ARMD successfully enter complete VR program , train session randomly select group VR professional help serve VR client ARMD effectively . If intervention strategy significantly increase ( 1 ) VR utilization rate ; ( 2 ) post-service employment rate ; ( 3 ) length post-service employment previously underserved group historically poor VR outcome , could significant role reduce immense impact , nationally , work disability due ARMD .
